segments.text: Believe it or not , tea is the most popular beverage in the world after water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , people from Asia to Europe all enjoy tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . And China is the homeland of tea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Chinese people love drinking tea so much . Some even claim they can't live without tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know there are several catagories of Chinese tea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I believe there are green teas , black teas and scented teas . Any Others ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , have you ever heard of Oulong tea and compressed tea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah . Oulong tea is good for one's health . isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You surely know a lot about Chinese tea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I like drinking tea at teahouses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't we go for one now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . We can chat while enjoying a cup there .
segments.speaker: S1
